stepAnswer: SELECT EmployeeName, HireDate FROM Employees ORDER BY HireDate ASC;
stepBody: To sort a list of employees by their hire date in ascending order, you can use this statement:
choices: SELECT EmployeeName (Comma) HireDate FROM Employees ORDER BY EmployeeName ASC;
SELECT EmployeeName (Comma) HireDate FROM Employees ORDER BY HireDate ASC;
SELECT EmployeeName (Comma) HireDate FROM Employees ORDER BY HireDate DESC;
SELECT EmployeeName (Comma) HireDate FROM Employees WHERE ORDER BY HireDate ASC;
SELECT EmployeeName, HireDate FROM Employees ORDER BY HireDate ASC;
